lyrics:
43 contributorstranslationsitalianowaking up in vegas lyricsverse 1
you gotta help me out

we need a taxi
cause youre hungover and im broke
i lost my fake id
but you lost the motel key
spare me your freakin
dirty looks now dont blame me

you wanna cash out
and get the hell outta town

chorus
shut up and put your money where your mouth is
thats what you get for wakin up in vegas
get up and shake the glitter off your clothes now

verse 2
why are these lights so bright

dressed up like elvis

you might also likeprechorus
dont call your mother
cause now were partners in crime

chorus
shut up and put your money where your mouth is
thats what you get for wakin up in vegas
get up and shake the glitter off your clothes now

break
remember what you told me

oh yeah

chorus
shut up and put your money where your mouth is
thats what you get for wakin up in vegas
